          <title>
            <string language="en">Interference of laser beams</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Störung der Laserstrahlen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Interférence des rayons laser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Interferência de feixes de laser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Interferenza dei fasci laser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρέμβαση των ακτίνων λέιζερ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Interferencia de los rayos laser</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the interference of two diffracted laser beams from a single laser source.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">coherent sources</string>
          </keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Störung von zwei 
gebeugten Laserstrahlen von einem einzelnen Lasersender.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'interférence de deux
rayons laser diffractés d'une source de laser simple.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a interferência de dois
feixes de laser diffracted de uma única fonte de laser.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra l'interferenza di due
fasci laser diffracted da una singola sorgente di laser.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την παρέμβαση δύο 
προξενημένων περίθλαση ακτίνων λέιζερ από μια ενιαία πηγή 
λέιζερ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la interferencia de dos
rayos laser difractados de una sola fuente de laser.</string>
          </description>
